## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:**	[Glyma.19G108800](https://legacy.soybase.org/sbt/search/search_results.php?category=FeatureName&version=Wm82.a4.v1&search_term=Glyma.19G108800)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>GmNAC181</u>
- **Gene Name:** transcriptional factor NAC 181
- **Genome:** [Wm82.a4.v1](https://legacy.soybase.org/GlycineBlastPages/blast_descriptions.php)
- **Species:** *Glycine max*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - **GmNAC181** promotes symbiotic nodulation and salt tolerance of nodulation by directly regulating GmNINa expression in soybean.
   - **GmNAC181** was highly induced by salt stress during nodulation and promoted symbiotic nodulation under salt stress.
   - **GmNAC181** acts as a network node orchestrating the expression of GmNINa and symbiotic nodulation under salt stress conditions.

   - [stress](/tags/stress/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[salt](/tags/salt/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[tolerance](/tags/tolerance/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[salt-tolerance](/tags/salt-tolerance/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[salt-stress](/tags/salt-stress/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[stress-tolerance](/tags/stress-tolerance/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[node](/tags/node/)
